key.name: enabled
key.description: Whether to show floating score windows for selected matches.

key.name: update-interval
key.description: The interval in seconds at which to fetch new match data.

key.name: num-windows
key.description: The maximum number of floating windows to display at once.

key.name: match-display-duration
key.description: The duration in seconds to display a single match before cycling to the next one, if multiple are selected.

key.name: selected-matches
key.description: An array of match IDs for which to display floating windows.

key.name: auto-view-new-matches
key.description: An array of event IDs for new matches are automatically added to live view.

key.name: keep-completed-duration
key.description: The duration in minutes to keep matches visible after they have finished.

key.name: enable-atp
key.description: Process events and matches from ATP tour

key.name: enable-wta
key.description: Process events and matches from WTA tour

key.name: enable-atp-challenger
key.description: Process events and matches from ATP Challenger tour
